main.*: {{Marvel Database:Team Template | Quotation = Where Kansans are threatened, there you will find The Harvesters! | Speaker = [[Topeka (Earth-616)|Topeka]] | Image = Harvesters (Earth-616) from Marvel Zombies Supreme Vol 1 2 002.jpg | ImageSize = 300 | Name = The Harvesters | Aliases = Harvesters | Status = Defunct | Identity = Public | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = [[Kansas (State)|Kansas]] | Leaders = [[Pioneer (Earth-616)|Pioneer]], formerly [[Topeka (Earth-616)|Topeka]] | CurrentMembers = [[Pioneer (Earth-616)|Pioneer]], [[Grain Belt (Earth-616)|Grain Belt]] | FormerMembers = [[Topeka (Earth-616)|Topeka]], [[Meadowlark (Earth-616)|Meadowlark]], [[Sunflower (Earth-616)|Sunflower]] | Allies = | Enemies = [[Hyperion (Zombie) (Earth-616)|Hyperion (Zombie)]] | Origin = | PlaceOfFormation = [[Kansas (State)|Kansas]] | PlaceOfDissolution = [[Kansas (State)|Kansas]] | Creators = Frank Marraffino; Fernando Blanco | First = Marvel Zombies Supreme #2 | Last = Marvel Zombies Supreme #2 | HistoryText = The Harvesters were the supreme super-team of [[Kansas (State)|Kansas]], possibly the [[Initiative]] team of their state. They encountered a Zombie Clone of [[Hyperion (Zombie) (Earth-616)|Hyperion]], who proceeded to kill them one by one. In the end, [[Pioneer (Earth-616)|Pioneer]] seemed to be the sole survivor due to Hyperion suffering from a bad case of Mad Cow Disease.{{r|Marvel Zombies Supreme #2}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = * Their affiliation to the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|Initiative]] was apparently a fan mistake later made canon: [[Stuart Vandal]]'s [http://comixfan.net/forums/showpost.php?p=1565803&postcount=221 statement]. | Links = }}
